DOC.brief_summary: A randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled study to assess the safety and effectiveness of a novel oral natural extract to improve the appearance of the skin of patients with senile purpura.
DOC.brief_title: A Novel Oral Natural Extract for the Treatment of Senile Purpura
DOC.criteria: Patients with evidence of purpura on physical exam Preexisting condition that would not allow the patients to take oral calcium supplement
